1{-# LANGUAGE ScopedTypeVariables #-}
2{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
3
4-- | Conditional relmaps.
5
6module Koshucode.Baala.Rop.Flat.Control
7  ( ropsControl,
8    -- * if
9    consIf, relmapIf, relkitIf,
10    -- * when & unless
11    consWhen, consUnless,
12    -- * fix & fix-join
13    consFix, consFixJoin,
14    -- * equal
15    consEqual, relmapEqual, relkitEqual,
16  ) where
17
18import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Overture         as O
19import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base             as B
20import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Data             as D
21import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Core             as C
22import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Rop.Base         as Rop
23import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Rop.Flat.Lattice as Rop
24import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Rop.Flat.Message as Msg
25
26
27-- | Implementation of relational operators.
28ropsControl :: (D.CContent c) => [C.Rop c]
29ropsControl = Rop.ropList "control"
30    --         CONSTRUCTOR      USAGE            ATTRIBUTE
31    [ Rop.rop  consEqual      [ "equal"      O.& "-relmap/" ]
32    , Rop.rop  consFix        [ "fix R"      O.& "-relmap/" ]
33    , Rop.rop  consFixJoin    [ "fix-join R" O.& "-relmap/" ]
34    , Rop.rop  consIf         [ "if T A B"   O.& "-test/ -then/ -else/" ]
35    , Rop.rop  consUnless     [ "unless T B" O.& "-test/ -else/" ]
36    , Rop.rop  consWhen       [ "when T A"   O.& "-test/ -then/" ]
37    ]
38
39
40-- ----------------------  if
41
42--  'if T A B' is same as 'A' when T is an empty relation
43--  or same as 'B' when T is not an empty relation.
44
45-- | __if T A B__
46consIf :: (Ord c) => C.RopCons c
47consIf med =
48  do mt <- Rop.getRelmap med "-test"
49     ma <- Rop.getRelmap med "-then"
50     mb <- Rop.getRelmap med "-else"
51     Right $ relmapIf med (mt, ma, mb)
52
53type Relmap3 c = (C.Relmap c, C.Relmap c, C.Relmap c)
54
55-- | Create @if@ relmap.
56relmapIf :: (Ord c) => C.Intmed c -> Relmap3 c -> C.Relmap c
57relmapIf med (mt, ma, mb) = C.relmapConfl med relkitIf [mt, ma, mb]
58
59-- | Create @if@ relkit.
60relkitIf :: (Ord c) => C.RelkitConfl c
61relkitIf [C.Relkit _ _ kitbT, C.RelkitOutput heA kitbA, C.RelkitOutput heB kitbB] _
62    | D.headEquiv heA heB = Right $ kit3
63    | otherwise = Msg.diffHead [heA, heB]
64    where
65      kit3 = C.relkitJust heA $ C.RelkitAbFull True kitf3 [kitbT, kitbA, kitbB]
66      kitf3 bmaps bo1 =
67          do let [bmapT, bmapA, bmapB] = bmaps
68             boT <- bmapT bo1
69             case boT of
70               [] -> align $ bmapB bo1
71               _  -> bmapA bo1
72      align :: O.Map (B.Ab [[c]])
73      align = fmap $ D.bodyForward heA heB
74
75relkitIf [kitT@(C.Relkit _ _ _), kitA@(C.Relkit hiA' hoA' kitbA), kitB@(C.Relkit hiB' hoB' kitbB)] _
76    | isNothing2 hoA' hoB' = Right C.relkitNothing
77    | isNothing hoA'       = relkitIf [kitT, C.Relkit hiB' hoB' kitbA, kitB] Nothing
78    | isNothing hoB'       = relkitIf [kitT, kitA, C.Relkit hiA' hoA' kitbB] Nothing
79relkitIf _ _ = Msg.unexpAttr "if T A b"
80
81isNothing :: Maybe D.Head -> Bool
82isNothing = (== Nothing)
83
84isNothing2 :: Maybe D.Head -> Maybe D.Head -> Bool
85isNothing2 a b = isNothing a && isNothing b
86
87
88
89-- ----------------------  when & unless
90
91-- | __when T A__
92consWhen :: (Ord c) => C.RopCons c
93consWhen med =
94  do rt <- Rop.getRelmap med "-test"
95     ra <- Rop.getRelmap med "-then"
96     Right $ relmapIf med (rt, ra, C.relmapId)
97
98-- | __unless T B__
99consUnless :: (Ord c) => C.RopCons c
100consUnless med =
101  do rt <- Rop.getRelmap med "-test"
102     rb <- Rop.getRelmap med "-else"
103     Right $ relmapIf med (rt, C.relmapId, rb)
104
105
106
107-- ----------------------  fix & fix-join
108
109-- | __fix R__
110consFix :: (Ord c) => C.RopCons c
111consFix med =
112  do rmap <- Rop.getRelmap med "-relmap"
113     Right $ relmapFix med rmap
114
115-- | __fix-join R__
116consFixJoin :: (Ord c) => C.RopCons c
117consFixJoin med =
118  do rmap <- Rop.getRelmap med "-relmap"
119     Right $ relmapFix med (Rop.relmapJoin med Nothing rmap)
120
121-- | Create @fix@ relmap.
122relmapFix :: (Ord c) => C.Intmed c -> O.Map (C.Relmap c)
123relmapFix med = C.relmapBinary med relkitFix
124
125-- | Create @fix@ relkit.
126relkitFix :: forall c. (Ord c) => C.RelkitBinary c
127relkitFix (C.RelkitOutput he2 kitb2) (Just he1)
128    | D.headEquiv he1 he2 = Right $ kit3
129    | otherwise = Msg.diffHead [he1, he2]
130    where
131      kit3 = C.relkitJust he1 $ C.RelkitAbFull True kitf3 [kitb2]
132      kitf3 bmaps = let [bmap2] = bmaps
133                        bmap2'  = C.bmapAlign he2 he1 bmap2
134                    in C.fixedRelation bmap2'
135relkitFix _ _ = Right C.relkitNothing
136
137
138-- ----------------------  equal
139
140-- | __equal R__
141consEqual :: (Ord c) => C.RopCons c
142consEqual med =
143    do rmap <- Rop.getRelmap med "-relmap"
144       Right $ relmapEqual med rmap
145
146-- | Create @equal@ relmap.
147relmapEqual :: (Ord c) => C.Intmed c -> O.Map (C.Relmap c)
148relmapEqual med = C.relmapBinary med relkitEqual
149
150-- | Create @equal@ relkit.
151relkitEqual :: (Ord c) => C.RelkitBinary c
152relkitEqual (C.RelkitOutput he2 kitb2) (Just he1) = Right kit3 where
153    kit3 = C.relkitJust mempty $ C.RelkitAbFull False kitf3 [kitb2]
154    kitf3 bmaps bo1 =
155        do let [bmap2] = bmaps
156           bo2 <- bmap2 bo1
157           Right $ if D.Rel he1 bo1 == D.Rel he2 bo2
158                   then [[]] else []
159relkitEqual _ _ = Right C.relkitNothing
